name: [2.55] Slope Combo
author: Moosh
info: A simple script for sloped surfaces in top-down.
description: A simple script for sloped surfaces in top-down.
setup:
Make sure you have Combos Run Scripts on Layer 0 checked under ZScript->Quest Script Settings so combo scripts can run.

Place this script on your combo and set arguments as follows:InitD[0]: Horizontal steepness of the slope. If the slope goes upwards when travelling right this value is negative. Else it's positive.InitD[1]: Vertical steepness of the slope. Link is pushed down by this much when walking up or down. Used for front or back face slopes.

This script requires std.zh and LinkMovement.zh.
